00005 namespace CALICE {

00007   void ModuleLocation::print(  std::ostream& os )
00008   {
00009     CellIndex a_cell( getCellIndexOffset() );
00010     os 
00011       << " cell index offset: layer=" << a_cell.getLayerIndex() 
00012       << " wafer=" << a_cell.getWaferColumn() << ", " << a_cell.getWaferRow();
00013     if (a_cell.getPadColumn()!=0 || a_cell.getPadRow()!=0) {
00014       os  << " pad=" << a_cell.getPadColumn() << ", " << a_cell.getPadRow();
00015     }
00016     os << " type=" << (int) getModuleType() 
00017        << " pos=" << getX() << "," << getY() << "," << getZ()
00018        << std::endl;
00019   }
